question: Hobbes was a supporter of?
explanation:
He was a strong supporter of Absolute Monarchy and a foe to Revolutionaries. Therefore, he
also condemned the English Civil War of 1642 between the Royalists (Supporters of absolute
powers of King Charles) and the Parliamentarians ( Champions of the overriding powers of
Parliament). In this horrific war the Royalists were defeated and Charles I was executed at the
behest of the Parliamentary Army in 1649.
